name: Chilli Jam (nahm prik pao)
recipeIngredient: 1 cup dried long red chilli (deseeded and chopped),
3 tbsp salt or 1/2 cup fish sauce.
recipeInstructions: 1. Heat oil in a wok and separately deep fry shallots garlic, prawns, chilies, and galangal until golden. Blend them all in a food processor, with the shrimp paste, moistening with some of the oil used for deep frying (up to 1 cup) to facilitate the blending.
2. In a pan, bring the mixture to the boil and season with palm sugar and tamarind water and salt or fish sauce.
3. Simmer until quite thick. stirring regularly. The resulting “jam" should taste sweet, sour, and salty.
